apps.name: AppDB Client
apps.subtitle: A fully-featured iOS client for appdb.to
apps.localizedDescription:
AppDB Client is a fully featured app aiming to provide a better experience for every appdb user

Features:

• Easily browse appdb database with a blazing fast and smooth user interface
• Control all your appdb linked devices
• Install any content to your device after authorizing the app
• Dowload IPAs from the web and install them right away
• MyAppStore & Automatic Requests integration!
• A wonderful dark mode
• iOS 14 homescreen Widgets!

And a lot more…

news.title: Welcome to WuXu's Library!
news.caption: Welcome to WuXu's Library, an IPA library with an active developer that loves sideloading! WuXu's Library is the most up-to-date altstore source there is, with all tweaks and apps being checked and updated every day.

news.title: Join the Discord!
news.caption: Click on this post to join the server, where you can make requests, get support or give me feedback.

news.title: AppDB Client Added!
news.caption: A new, beautiful, and open source appdb client for iOS.
